name: Dolly Parton
summary: Country music legend, prolific songwriter, actress, and philanthropist who built entertainment empire while maintaining authentic connection to Appalachian roots and championing literacy and education.

bias_awareness.self_awareness_level: extremely high - self-aware about image and reality

adaptation_patterns: evolved career across music, film, business, philanthropy

cognitive_humanism.human_centered_thinking: focused on helping children and communities

humanistic_cognition.holistic_perspective: music as platform for broader impact

human_needs_hierarchy.belonging_connection: maintained mountain roots and family ties
human_needs_hierarchy.self_actualization: used success to help others and preserve heritage

self_actualization.purpose_alignment: entertainment and helping others, especially children
self_actualization.growth_trajectory: poor mountain girl → country star → business mogul → philanthropist icon

behavioral_growth.learning_evolution: from musician to complete entertainment and business leader
behavioral_growth.response_to_failure: persisted with optimism and hard work

technology_relationship.adoption_level: pragmatic adopter for business and reach
technology_relationship.digital_fluency: moderate - embraced platforms for philanthropy and business
technology_relationship.ai_perspective: open to technology that helps people
technology_relationship.platform_preference: diverse - music, theme parks, books, social media
technology_relationship.tech_integration: used technology to scale literacy program globally

crisis_response.stress_patterns: maintained positive outlook and worked through challenges

influence_style.change_mechanism: inspired through example and direct help

resource_relationship.wealth_perspective: tool for helping others and preserving heritage
resource_relationship.resource_transparency: open about using wealth for good

time_orientation.time_horizon: legacy-focused - Imagination Library for future generations
time_orientation.legacy_concern: high - wanted to help children long-term
time_orientation.present_vs_future_balance: worked in present for future impact
time_orientation.intergenerational_thinking: literacy program for all future children
